text: Ra uniharu tyasama kara'unechan ki ‘‘he hamro palanakarta! Hamiharula'i (yahambata) nikalihala! (Aba) hamile asala karma garnechaum, naki tyo juna aghi garne gardathyaum’’. (Allahale bhannecha) ke ‘‘hamile timila'i yati umera di'eka thi'enaum ki tyasama je socna cahanthyau socihalthyau, ra timro pasama sacetakarta pani ayo. Tasartha aba svada cakhirakha yasta atyacariharuko kohi maddatagara (sahayaka) chaina.’’
